text: Rocky III is a 1982 American sports drama movie. It was directed, written by, and starred, Sylvester Stallone. The movie is about a famed boxer fighting against Clubber Lang. It is the sequel to Rocky II. It was followed by Rocky IV in 1985. ==Cast== * Sylvester Stallone as Robert "Rocky" Balboa, Sr., a heavyweight champion. * Talia Shire as Adrian Balboa, Rocky's wife. * Burt Young as Paulie Pennino, Adrian's brother; a meat-packing plant worker by trade, Paulie lets Rocky train in the freezer. * Carl Weathers as Apollo Creed, Rocky's friend and heavyweight champion. The character was based on real-life boxing great Muhammad Ali. * Burgess Meredith as Mickey Goldmill: Rocky's manager and trainer, a former bantamweight fighter from the 1920s and the owner of the local boxing gym. * Mr. T as Clubber Lang, Rocky's next opponent and killer of Mickey Goldmill. ==Sequels== * Rocky IV (1985) * Rocky V (1990) * Rocky Balboa (2006) * Creed (2015) * Creed II (2018) ==Other websites== * Category:1980s sports movies Category:1982 drama movies Category:Movies set in Philadelphia Category:Movies directed by Sylvester Stallone Category:Screenplays by Sylvester Stallone Category:Rocky movies
